review: Arrived on time and as expected!
author: F. Lofrano and Son- Training

review: Very inexpensive and versatile.  Works beautifully with Popcorn Time IO internet streaming and VideoStream Chrome browser app for local streaming over 2.4GHz 802.11n (802.11g is insufficient and will cause buffering).  Can combine a $10 HDMI-to-audio jack adapter to turn dumb speakers into smart speakers and stream music to them over WIFI anywhere in the house without the distance limitation of bluetooth.  Thinking about using that combo with 8" or so display with HDMI input as an inexpensive in-car system to mirror my phone to for navigation, music, movies, etc. for on the road.Only way to make it better is if it has 5GHz 802.11ac support.
author: GoTheDistance
